MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut in the TD7 & TD9 postcode areas of Selkirk & Hawick  affecting properties in Cacrabank  and surrounding areas. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut however our engineers have now arrived on site and in order to repair a fault on our overhead line network, we now need to carry out an emergency shutdown at 11:30am. This may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:41am on the 24th of April 2021
